name: Claricity Consulting
description: Created a modern and responsive single page website for Claricity Consulting using Bootstrap, JavaScript, CSS and HTML

name: Michigan Data Science Team
description: This work was done for the Michigan Data Science Team - MDST, a club at the University of Michigan. Designed a mock up in Figma. Then implemented website features using NextJS (React Framework) and Tailwind. The website was desgigned to be edited easily and almost all text, images and other assests are configurable.

name: In2ition Inc
description: Created a mockup in Adobe Xd. Then implemented it with basic HTML and JavaScript, leveraging Boostrap and CSS for styling.

name: Pocket Planes Calculator
description: Love playing Pocket Planes on my phone and found current calculators didn't work well on mobile and were not userfreindly or acessible. Made improvements such as styling searable drop down and more acessible layout

name: M-Hub
description: Created a single page website based on MDST website (see above) for The Buisness Research Club at Michigan, another club at the University of Michigan

name: Headquarters Economy
description: First responsive website I ever made!
